results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 188fe9ced0a44a4caf3f60f36cbf414b. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users cannot log in when using passwords with special characters
arguments.success_criteria: All character types (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special) are supported and regression tests pass

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit de3774efa2e4479dac75dc553512c2d6:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests
